subject: docs: restructure CLAUDE.md merging engineering standards with project context
body:
Merged a proposed engineering standards template with the existing project-specific
CLAUDE.md. Adds hard rules (code organization limits, decision documentation, UX
guidelines, security, cleanup, quality checks), communication style, testing
guidelines, project config, workflow, and prohibitions while preserving all existing
session management, domain context, and project documentation.

Fixed stale "keep vanilla JS" instruction - project uses TypeScript/SvelteKit.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01AXav1nwVybvmofE6Hca7KF
title: restructure CLAUDE.md merging engineering standards with project context
